alert.note: Alert for Okanogan Valley (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued September 19 at 9:07PM PDT until September 20 at 7:00PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...Gusty north winds and dry conditions Tuesday... .North winds will increase down the Okanogan Valley into Tuesday. Strong winds will be coupled with dry conditions Tuesday afternoon into the early evening increasing the potential for rapid spread of any new fires. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR THE OKANOGAN VALLEY... * Affected Area: Fire Weather Zone 703 Okanogan Valley (Zone 703). * Winds: North 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * Relative Humidities: 14 to 20 percent. * Impacts: Rapid fire spread with any new fires.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
